name: HumanTouchSuperNovoVirtualTherapist
0:
”Alexa, ask my Novo to give me a massage.”
”Alexa, ask my Novo to restore.”
”Alexa, ask my Novo to run energize.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my novo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Complementing its advanced massage technology, the Human Touch Super Novo is the first massage chair to implement Alexa capability with the help of Virtual Therapist. Make massage personal again by asking Virtual Therapist to give you a customized massage and feel the smooth glide of the recline sweep you back into a perfect state of relaxation. It's relaxation re-imagined.
 
You will communicate with Virtual Therapist through your Amazon Alexa enabled device to choose your preferences for a truly unique and personalized massage.
 
Virtual Therapist will ask you a series of questions, including your physical requirements and massage preferences, and then store your information so that you can receive a massage tailored to your exact needs any time you like. Each member of your household can create their own, personal, Virtual Therapist profile. 

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice.
 
To use this skill, you must have a Human Touch Super Novo massage chair connected to your home WiFi network.
- You will need a Virtual Therapist Bridge to allow your Super Novo massage chair to communicate with your Alexa device. To request your complimentary bridge, please visit: humantouch.com/vtbridge
- Once you have your Virtual Therapist Bridge, please visit: humantouch.com/virtualtherapist to set-up your Virtual Therapist account
- From there you will be taken through a short series of steps to enable Virtual Therapist and complete your Wi-Fi set-up
